description.@en: Should we follow the correct ratios, we’ll be able to produce enough for the fight . . . but should our measurements be off, KABOOM!

effect.@en:
Create Blackpowder: The more potent the bomb is, the more the Difficulty Rating eases or worsens:

Add +0 Total Damage: (Routine +10%) Alchemy

Add +3 Total Damage: (Standard +/-0%) Alchemy

Add +6 Total Damage: (Challenging -10%) Alchemy

Effect: If successful, you create a number of charges for every 6 points of your [IB]. If failed, nothing happens. 

[IB] 1 to 6: Ten charges

[IB] 7 to 12: Twenty charges

[IB] 13+: Thirty charges

criticalSuccess.@en: You create thirty charges of Blackpowder.

reagents.@en: You must have access to an Alchemistâ€™s laboratory, charcoal, sulfur and saltpeter. Blackpowder can be found in Article 5: Wares & Weapons.
